oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Fourth Avenue North Near Gay Street, c.1950
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of 4th Avenue North near Gay Street in downtown Nashville. American Bread Co. is visible in the background. Photographed by the Nashville Housing Authority. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
